info.title: Auto Complete API
info.description: Auto Complete API Overview The Composite Service Auto Complete API is a REST-based service communicating via HTTPS and JSON that facilitates the FP Type Ahead functionality. All requests to the API must be via HTTPS (SSL).           ### Testing account    Contact document author to set up.     ***Changes***   | Version | Changes |   |  ------------ | ------------- |   | 0.1 | Document set up. |   | 0.2 | Added security. |   | 0.3 | Added field "query" in response of /autoComplete/suggestion. |   | 1.0 | Released. Minor updates to description. |     | 1.0.1 | Update basePath, endpoints, changed POC to Percy and add license section for APIM update |    #### ---------------------------------------------------------------

post.description: Returns a list of possible Points of Interest or brands based on the original query string in the request.  ** Sort_by Value Lookup Table (WIP) **   Key | Value      ------------ | -------------     1 | query first (default)     2 | entity first

current_lat.description: Latitude of the device making the call to the CSL. If unknown, pass a value of -999.999.

current_lng.description: Longitude of the device making the call to the CSL. If unknown, pass a value of -999.999.

limit.description: Maximum number of results in response. Defaults to ten (10) when not present.

locale.description: The default value is "en-us" when not present.

query.description: The input string that suggestions will be made on. The minimum length is three (3) letters/numbers or two (2) characters. It could be partial/full landmark name, partial/full street address or partial/full name of a destination category.

search_lat.description: Latitude of the center point of search.

search_lng.description: Longitude of the center point of search.

sort_by.description: The field by which the results are ordered. The default value is 1 when not present. See Sort_by Value Lookup Table for other supported values.

sort_order.description: The only accepted values include "asc" for ascending order, and "desc" for descending order. The default value is "desc" when not present. This field is ignored when value of "sort_by" is set to 1 or 2.

id.description: Only included when the suggestion type is "entity".

label.description: Complete name of a place, a category of places, or a brand.

query.description: The input string that suggestions will be made on. The minimum length is three (3) letters/numbers or two (2) characters. It could be partial/full landmark name, partial/full street address or partial/full name of a destination category.

type.description: Type of suggestion. Possible values include "query" (as a category of places, or a brand), "entity" (as a point of interest), and etc.
